question: 世に出る
sourceMnemonic: Here we have <kanji>world</kanji> with the particle に, following by the verb <ja>出る</ja> (to go out). Put that together and this means <vocabulary>to go out into the world</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to be published</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to be released to the public</vocabulary> in some way or another. Once it's out there in the world, there's even a chance for it <vocabulary>to become renowned</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This uses kun'yomi readings for both kanji, which you should already know by now, so I think you're good to go!
